text:
Key Vocabulary

You just identified some of your stakeholders!

A stakeholder is any person who cares about your design solution or will be affected by it in some way. In this case, stakeholders are people in your community that you will affect if you create a design solution for water conservation. They have a stake in your design solution.

A design solution can affect many people:

  • people that care about the design solution
  • people that use the design solution (even if they don't care about it very much)
  • people that want the design solution in their community (even if they might not use it)
  • people that might not want the design solution in their community
  • people that will give money, time, or other resources to create the design solution
